title: Apple adds pair of mixed reality headset patents to its portfolio as AR/VR product development continues
content:
While Apple Glasses rumors continue to brew, it seems we may be getting closer to seeing an augmented reality/virtual reality (AR/VR) headset from the tech giant. According to Patently Apple, the U.S. Patent and Trademark Office has granted Apple two mixed reality (MR) headset patents.

more…

The post Apple adds pair of mixed reality headset patents to its portfolio as AR/VR product development continues appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: The U.S. Patent and Trademark Office has granted Apple two mixed reality (MR) headset patents ahead of a possible Apple headset debut.
